JoviBit.Led.clear:
Turn off all LEDs.
You need to call 'show' to make the changes visible
JoviBit.Led.setPixel:
Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
You need to call 'show' to make the changes visible
JoviBit.Led.show: Send all the changes to the strip.
JoviBit.Led.showColor: show the LED with the chosen color
JoviBit.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
JoviBit.configuracion: Configurate servo to make not continuos
JoviBit.create: Create a NeoPixel driver for LEDs
JoviBit.hsl: Converts a hue saturation luminosity value into a RGB color
JoviBit.moverServo: Move shaft to the desired angle
JoviBit.moverServo|param|pin: servo at pin(A al G) eg:0
JoviBit.rgb: Convierte los canales red, green, blue en color RGB
